column1: Working as Developer ,Backup Project Leader and DPCA (Defect Prevention and Causal Analyst). Also
worked as Team member and six members are reporting to me directly.
This is a write-up that explains why you wish to enter the Master of IT in Business programme, in
what ways you believe you are qualified, and your future career aspirations.
Life is the sum total of the choices one make. This simple quote has had a profound effect on my
life ever since I encountered it. I find it to be true that our lives span out in the direction
decided by our choices. This has made me realize the importance of making good decisions in life. I
have always had tact for making considered decisions and have strived to improve this ability at

every opportunity. 
Since an early age, my focus has been on learning new things and experimenting
with my thoughts. School was my first source of knowledge and I showed particular interest toward
the sciences. During my secondary school education I secured 92 percent proving my potential as top
notch student with my first board exam. My drive towards learning different things made to choose
Computer Science as my base in Higher Secondary Education and once again excelled by securing 92
percent in my second board exam which paved me a pathway to get good knowledge in my under
graduation.  Hence, when the time came to decide on my major field of study in college I favoured

Engineering, Electrical & Communication Engineering in particular.
Initially I entered my college
with myself with a plan of excelling only in academics to maintain consistency from my schooling. My
college was the place which added more fuel to my desire where I had an opportunity to project
myself as a good team player, leader and a perfect manager through various activities including
Sports have been an important part of my life also. It helps me relax and I enjoy
developing new tactics and game strategies. I was in my college team for Basketball, Volleyball and
Ball Badminton. I also served as Captain of the Basketball team.
Every time I do encourage myself
such that in any area wherever we are, we should show our presence and should place a impeccable
place for our position so that we could make a history.  In accordance with my above thought my
final year of my college life created a lot of wonderful memories to me and I feel proud to share
the same here. It was my last year in my college of under graduation in my captaincy I won

Basketball Intramurals held on 2012,which is a sports event held at my college level. 
Also in
academics my consistency has been maintained maintaining my CGPA as 8.51 and made proud of my
parents securing ?FIRST CLASS WITH DISTINCTION? in my undergraduate education. I have completed my
final year of graduation by developing an innovative project named ?Digital Security on Images
through wavelet transformation? where we have given security to data by watermarking on digital
images such that it is transformed from one end to another providing high security.
extra-curricular activities I served as a ?Coordinator? in my technical symposium named
?SANKEETHIKA? and the challenging task that was given to me was to coordinate the events and I gave
my hundred percent commitment proving myself to get the symposium done successfully without any
hurdles. Any task which is well planned is half done and is a part of managing quality of a person
and my role in my college technical symposium taught me how to plan things effectively.
various accolades of learning and willingness towards learning getting into a professional life was
not that tough task irrespective of the competition that prevails.
I easily nailed through my on
campus placement and my decision to join Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) a leading software services
provider as my first job proved to be prudent. I was delighted by the variety of the tasks handled
by the company. We had clients in diverse fields including banking, digital and print media, retail
and others. I was given an opportunity to work in Retail Domain. Working for TCS has helped me
imbibe the nuances of all these different sectors of industry. However, my expertise is in the
retail field and I have been a part of the team handling merchandising operations of ?The Home
Depot? for a period of about two years. I joined the team as a System Engineer and worked in that
position for a year until I received an opportunity to use my knowledge of application development
in a managerial position. I was asked to manage a team of five members which was responsible for the
daily maintenance and upkeep of a part of the various systems used by TCS in it?s The Home Depot
operations. The task was incredibly challenging as the volume of data processed was immense and
required a cool and rational state of mind to prevent any untoward loss of data. I excelled at this
role and received various accolades from both my employer and client for my efforts. I was awarded
with ?Certificate of Excellence? from my client The Home Depot. Knowing my values TCS awarded me
with ?On the Spot Winner? for handling various tasks given by the organization in efficient way.
This was my first experience professionally in a managerial role and this change served another
purpose as well. It illuminated a new career path which complemented my strengths very well vis a
vis management. I realize now that I am capable of analyzing and dissecting a contingency to find
the root cause and determine a set of tasks aimed at dealing with several issues. Until now, my
education has been toward acquiring technical knowledge. I would like to supplement it with a strong
knowledge of managerial methodologies and tools. I envision myself possessing this knowledge two
years from now and joining a consultancy firm similar to my current employer.
lookout for courses that will aid me in acquiring these skills. I am impressed by the portfolio of
your Master of IT in Business Analytics program. The importance that you give to the strategy
development in this course suits my career needs particularly well. Besides, having an opportunity
to improve my skill set I believe that learning from an international university will definitely
serve to improve my understanding about IT practises worldwide.
Joining programme is contingent on SMU scholarship
Interested in applying for internship position
Previously applied for graduate admission in SMU
Do you have any criminal record?
WDA ICT-STEP scholarship (only for Singaporeans with a sponsoring company)
would like to apply for this scholarship.
Kindly specify the track that you are interested to pursue for the Master of IT in Business.
